reviewText:
This video doesn't teach anything about braiding
or anything else for that matter! I bought this DVD
thinking that it would teach me to braid my clydesdale's
maine for a show next month......... It wasted my time!
My 3 year old son knows more about a Clydesdale than
This lady in the DVD.

When I was in grade school I saw a short movie about a Clydesdale colt and how he progressed in his growth and training until he became one of the lead horses in the Budweiser Clydesdale coach.  I wanted to have a copy if it existed.  Then I found this one on clydesdales from Maine.  I wanted to donate it to the library, too; but they couldn't guarantee that they would keep it in their collection.  I decided to keep it myself just to be safe.
